```{r}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(ggthemes)
library(ggforce)
```



```{r}
main_data <- read.csv("/Users/ty/Documents/Github/forest_structural_diversity/data_quality_control/forest_div_quality_control_v1.csv")
```


```{r}
n <- names(main_data)
```

```{r}
main_data |>
  #dplyr::select("nfamilies") |>
  ggplot() + 
  #geom_histogram() +
  geom_density(aes(x=.panel_x, col="red")) +
  theme_tufte() +
  facet_matrix(vars(n))
```


```{r}
 ggsave("qc_density_plots.pdf",
  width = 22,
  height = 40,
  units = "in",
  dpi = 600,
  limitsize = FALSE,
  bg = NULL
)
```
